name: Hero Epic War: Hero Rescue
description:
- Do you feel our game is very familiar, it is the game that very recently appeared in promotional videos.
- This is a game that requires a lot of calculating thinking, you need to pull the pin exactly to help the boy kill the kidnappers, take their money and find their way to rescue his fiancee.
- Are you confident enough to help our hero? Let's get started!
- Our game is extremely simple to manipulate and many attractive parts.
- Challenges will be continually updated as soon as possible.
- We believe you will be attracted to our game. So why wait any longer without downloading "Hero Epic War" to enjoy this feeling.

DOWNLOAD " HERO EPIC WAR : PUZZLE HERO " FREE NOW
